data.title: This Is Where Jamie Lynn Spears Really Stands With Her First Baby Daddy In 2022
data.meta_description: Actress Jamie Lynn Spears rose to fame in the mid-2000s thanks to her sister Britney Spears. In 2005, she got cast as the lead character on the Nickelodeon teen sitcom Zoey 101. However, three years later Jamie Lynn Spears gave birth to her first child after which she went on a five-year hiatus.
data.text:
Actress Jamie Lynn Spears rose to popularity in the mid-2000s due to her sister Britney Spears. In 2005, she were given forged because the lead personality on the Nickelodeon youngster sitcom Zoey 101. However, three years later Jamie Lynn Spears gave beginning to her first kid and then she went on a five-year hiatus.

Related: Jamie Lynnâs Subtle Reaction To Britney Spearsâ Pregnancy

Today, we are taking a more in-depth look at Jamie Lynn Spears's personal lifestyles. The actress lately doesn't have a great relationship with her sister Britney Spears, but she does seem to be thankfully married. Keep on scrolling to determine whether Jamie Lynn Spears ended up tying the knot with her first kid's father!

Jamie Lynn Spears Got Pregnant At The Age Of 16

In December 2007 Jamie Lynn Spears introduced that she was pregnant via her boyfriend Casey Aldridge. At the time, the young actress was once 16 years previous. Her boyfriend â whom she had been dating for two years â was once 18 on the time. In March 2008, Jamie Lynn Spears announced her engagement to Casey Aldridge, and in May 2008 the 2 moved to Liberty, Mississippi where they deliberate to lift their kid.

Related: The Truth About Britney Spearsâ Relationship With Jamie Lynnâs Ex, Casey Aldridge

Jamie Lynn printed that when her circle of relatives and group learned of her being pregnant, everyone decided to hide it. "There was a whole lot of fighting going on between everyone involved. The entire Spears team was already caught up in my sister's PR difficulties, and everyone around me just wanted to make this 'issue' disappear," Jamie Lynn revealed in her memoir Things I Should Have Said. "My family and management pulled me out of school until they could figure out what to do next. They took my smartphone away, fearing the news would get out, and insisted that no one share any information with anyone, especially the press."

On June 19, 2008, Jamie Lynn Spears gave start to their daughter Maddie Briann Aldridge. Unfortunately, in March 2009, Spears and Aldridge ended their engagement. In August 2010 they rekindled their romance simplest to break up once more 4 months later. At the time, a source for People Magazine revealed: "She did a lot of growing up, but he didn't. I think she put up with more than she cared to put up with. She just got enough of it and was tired of the situation."

Related: Here's What The 'Sweet Magnolias' Cast Has Said About Jamie Lynn Spears

This year, Jamie Lynn Spears published her guide Things I Should Have Said, in which she additionally mentioned her ex Casey Aldridge. Aldridge's sister Ashley Aldridge Havard published that some issues Jamie Lynn discussed in her memoir don't seem to be true. "Heâs never, ever been called Casper. Thatâs not a nickname. As soon as we saw that, we were like 'Where did that come from?' Literally," she said. "But I personally think that it was a dig on Casey. Like, I think that sheâs calling him Casper, sheâs saying like, heâs a ghost to them. Thatâs just my theory. But just knowing Jamie Lynn, and how her mind is, I think thatâs why she did that."

Aldridge's sister additionally printed that Jamie and Casey's dating was the whole lot but easiest: "She physically abused Casey on several different occasions. She was very rageful. She would get angry any time she didnât get her way. â¦ She hit him with a lamp one time, she got mad at him at Britneyâs condo in Destin, and she hit him with his belt several times. â¦I donât think it was anything huge, just regular fightsâ¦ it just turns dark very fast."

Who Is Jamie Lynn Spears Married To?

Today, the actress â who is worth $6 million â is married to businessman Jamie Watson. Watson owns communications service Advanced Media Partners, and after two years of dating the 2 announced their engagement in March 2013. A year later the couple married in New Orleans. In April 2018, Jamie Lynn Spears gave birth to her 2nd daughter, Ivey Joan Watson.

In a 2016 TLC special titled Jamie Lynn Spears: When the Lights Go Out, Jamie Watson revealed that he didn't know who Jamie Lynn Spears was when they met: "I'm just a normal guy with a normal job. I did not know about the family. I didnât know she had a TV show. I didnât know anything about her." In the same special, Jamie Lynn Spears revealed that it took her somewhat longer to fall in love with her husband: "I think we grew on each other, which is probably why we are still together. He was always uncomfortable. â¦ looking back though, I think itâs kind of sweet because he was acting that way because obviously he liked me."
